typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['note.json'],
	mapColumn(
		each(match(position == 1),
			"body" = $$),
		each(match(position == 2),
			"from" = $$),
		each(match(position == 3),
			"heading" = $$),
		each(match(position == 4),
			"number" = $$),
		each(match(position == 5),
			"to" = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
